body: Freya is staring into our souls in the thumbnail.
Dang I was looking for FreyaxBell or something not this stuff

i get that this is hentai but this is COMPLETE bullshit and would NEVER happen in the context of the series AT ANY POINT. not even sure if that's a valid complaint on this site. the art is cool tho i guess
Hehe Nice comments back and awesome hentai btw
